Miscellaneous

EditRes Interface

The editres program is a standard program distributed with the X Window System. It allows graphical browsing and changing of a program's X resources.

To support the editres program, the program must support a special "EditRes Protocol". To enable this protocol, the enableEditRes method in misc/editres should be invoked. After this, the program's resources can be manipulated by editres.
